name: nexterm
description: Nexterm is a self-hosted web-based terminal emulator for accessing shells remotely via browser. It supports SSH and offers secure command execution without needing a native terminal client.
features: Web-based terminal: Access command-line interfaces through a browser without native terminal software.
SSH connections: Connect to remote servers via SSH with credential management.
Multiple sessions: Open and manage multiple terminal sessions in tabs or windows.
Connection profiles: Save server configurations for quick access to frequently used hosts.
Secure authentication: Support for password, key-based, and two-factor authentication methods.
Command history: Access previous commands with searchable history across sessions.
File transfer: Upload and download files between local system and remote servers.
Customizable appearance: Adjust colors, fonts, and themes for comfortable terminal usage.
Clipboard integration: Copy and paste text between browser and terminal sessions.
Session recording: Log terminal sessions for audit trails and troubleshooting.
Mobile responsive: Access terminals from tablets and smartphones with touch-friendly interface.
Access control: Manage user permissions and restrict access to specific servers or commands.
